sentences.sContent: The room was quiet; no one volunteered any further information.
sentences.sCn: 房间里很安静；没有人主动提供更多的信息。

sentences.sContent: "They were both great supporters of Franco," Ryle volunteered.
sentences.sCn: “他们俩都是佛朗哥的坚定支持者，”赖尔主动说道。

words.tran: 自愿的；志愿的；自发的；故意的

trans.tranOther: If you volunteer information, you tell someone something without being asked
